thread.title: Kim Mc Ivans Pasion
thread.title_full: www.lanieri.com recensione scritta da Kim Mc Ivans Pasion

author: Kim Mc Ivans Pasion
title: Kim Mc Ivans Pasion
text:
Before Lanieri I wouldn't dare deviate from the typical suit designs and fit. The first visit opens up horizons to what you can do with your suit. You get educated with the different options from lapels to number of threads... man you'll become a suit expert with the consultation session. You also get style advice based on your fit and look preference. The experience was pleasantly surprising: I can describe it as 'truly owning the suit' because you know it up to the smallest detail!
Kudos Michele! I am very happy with my first Lanieri suit and I am excited for the next one!
